channel.title: Discourse tip: Use # to jump to a specific post
channel.description:
Just discovered this.
If you're in a topic with lots of posts & want to jump to the top, or to a specific post number, try pressing #
That is all.

item.title: Discourse tip: Use # to jump to a specific post
item.dc:creator: akabillposters
item.description:
SpaghettiSauce:

There’s a blue bar at the right which is easy to use to scroll to the top

No always easy. On longer threads it can sometimes scroll up in jumps, rather than a single jump, due to the way the thread posts are loaded ‘on demand’.
